intro: Hieracium dertosense, commonly known as the Dertosense hawkweed, is a flowering plant belonging to the Asteraceae family. It is characterized by its basal rosette of hairy, dark green leaves and produces numerous yellow to orange composite flowers. Native to specific regions in Europe, it thrives in moist, calcareous soils. The plant is perennial and often found in meadows and woodland edges. Its botanical features make it a notable species for ecological studies and botanical gardens.
